original_body_lines: Foreign Affairs Minister Ali Sabry yesterday met India’s Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman on the side-lines of the annual meeting of the Asian Development Bank in Incheon, Republic of Korea.

“Glad to meet with the Minister of Finance of India @nsitharaman in #Seoul on the sidelines of #ADB 56th annual meeting. We discussed further strengthening the bilateral relationship & economic partnership for the benefit of both our nations #ADBAnnualMeeting @SLinSouthKorea,” tweeted Sabry.
